definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: His body is made from premium plush over a flexible wire frame .
sentences.chinese: 他的身體是由優質毛絨線較靈活的框架。

sentences.english: Winter, it is appropriate quality thick wool fabric.
sentences.chinese: 冬季，宜用質厚的絨線布。

sentences.english: Her mother gives her a stocking cap as a gift.
sentences.chinese: 她母親送給她一個絨線帽做禮物。

sentences.english: I like to wear my red cardigan.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡穿我的那件紅開襟絨線衫。

sentences.english: Now use six dry cells and replace the iron wire by thin steel wool.
sentences.chinese: 現在以細鋼絨線代替細鐵絲，用6節乾電池重做實驗。

sentences.english: See how your cat has messed up my ball of wool.
sentences.chinese: 瞧你的貓把我的絨線球弄亂了。

sentences.english: When winter comes, Granny used to go out with her gray woolly hat on.
sentences.chinese: 每當冬天，奶奶總要戴那頂灰色的絨線帽去上街。

sentences.english: Fabric made of this cord, commonly used for bedspreads or rugs.
sentences.chinese: 一般用作牀罩或地毯的繩絨線織成的織物。

sentences.english: Wrap yarn around the back of your thumb and forefinger.
sentences.chinese: 把絨線繞過你的大拇指和食指。

sentences.english: She purchased a knitted petticoat and sent it to the Thenardiers.
sentences.chinese: 她買一條絨線編織的裙，寄給了德納第。
